articles.content: Jenner Institute Director Adrian Hill, who oversees the Oxford-AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine research and development, said a vaccine would not be available in the United States until “the middle of n… [+903 chars]

articles.title: Gold Declines Close To 2% After Initial Gains In December: 3 Reasons For Weakness - Goodreturns
articles.description: After climbing almost 5% so far in December considering Tuesdays price, gold again retreated lower by a steep 1.8 percent on the MCX on December 9, 2020.

articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: EPFO members to get 8.5% interest for FY19-20 at one go. Here's how interest is calculated on your PF balance - Times Now
articles.description: The compound interest is credited on monthly running balance basis at the statutory rate declared for each year. Closing balance for the year = opening balance + contributions – withdrawal (if any) + interest
articles.content: New Delhi: Subscribers of Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) are likely to get the entire 8.5% declared interest rate for FY2019-20 at one go as EPFO has been able to sell its equity holdi… [+3489 chars]

articles.title: Pfizer-BioNTech Says Vaccine Documents Hacked In Europe Cyberattack - NDTV
articles.description: Two pharmaceutical companies in line for first conditional approval for their Covid-19 vaccine by the EU's medicine regulator said Wednesday their documents were "unlawfully accessed" during a cyberattack on a European Medicines Agency server.
articles.content:
Pfizer-BioNTech said they were unaware of any personal data being accessed (Representational)
